verses.roman:
mora tattva-līlā-rasa tomāra gocare
ataeva ei-rūpa dekhāiluṅ tomāre

synonyms: mora—My; tattva-līlā—truth and pastimes; rasa—and mellows; tomāra—of you; gocare—within the knowledge; ataeva—therefore; ei-rūpa—this form; dekhāiluṅ—I have shown; tomāre—unto you.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu confirmed, "All the truths about My pastimes and mellows are within your knowledge. Therefore I have shown this form to you.
